title: Terms of Use
paragraphs: Welcome to FlirtSpark. By using our website, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
This website is for entertainment purposes only. We do not guarantee the effectiveness, appropriateness, or accuracy of any pick-up lines.
You are responsible for your own interactions and communications with others based on content generated on this site.
FlirtSpark may include affiliate links (e.g., Amazon, AliExpress). If you click and make a purchase, we may earn a small commission at no extra cost to you.
We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Continued use of the site indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.
If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our website.
